Title: Tom and Jerry: A Nutcracker Tale
Writer: Joseph Barbera (story), Spike Brandt (screenplay), William Hanna (based on characters created by), Joseph Barbera (characters), Tom Minton (additional material by)
Actors: Chantal Strand, Ian James Corlett, Kathleen Barr, Tara Strong
Plot: Tom and his army of stray cats take over Jerry's magical kingdom of living toys. Chased by Tom and his cronies, Jerry must find the Toymaker and get help to win his kingdom back before sunrise when the window of opportunity closes.
